titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the pretended Sacrament of extreme unction with an account of the occasions and beginnings of it in the Western church : in three parts : with a letter to the vindicator of the Bishop of Condom.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Clagett. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
A second letter ... to the vindicator ([1], 14 p.) has special t.p., dated 1688.
Imperfect: Special t.p. and last 14 p. lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
